sentences.en: According to such layered structure three open source frameworks , Tapestry , Spring and Hibernate, are briefly introduced in this paper.

sentences.en: Hedgerows and meadows are thick with a tapestry of wild flowers.

sentences.en: The Bayeux Tapestry is the most famous surviving piece of needlework.

sentences.en: The seats of the chairs had been recovered in tapestry.
